sql.select-sync-data: declare @last_synchronization_version bigint = (select [version] from [synchronization_version] where name='#table#') SELECT P.*, CT.Id as realId, CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION as opertion, CT.SYS_CHANGE_Version as version FROM [#table#] AS P RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [#table#],@last_synchronization_version) AS CT ON P.id = CT.id
sql.update-version: if EXISTS(select * from [synchronization_version] where name='#table#') begin update [synchronization_version] set version=@version where name='#table#' and version<@version end else begin insert into [synchronization_version](name,version)values('#table#',0) end
